original_text: And he shall bring to the priest as his compensation to the Lord a ram without blemish out of the flock, or its equivalent, for a guilt offering.
korean_text: 그는 또 그 속건제물을 여호와께 가져갈지니 곧 네가 지정한 가치대로 양 떼 중 흠 없는 숫양을 속건제물을 위하여 제사장에게로 끌고 갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: And he shall bring to the priest
as his compensation to the Lord
a ram without blemish out of the flock
sentences.korean_translation: 양 떼 중에서 흠 없는 수양을
